sentences.en: ...a cow elephant.
sentences.cn: …一头母象。

sentences.en: a cow suckling her calves
sentences.cn: 给小牛吃奶的母牛

sentences.en: a herd of cows
sentences.cn: 一群牛

sentences.en: a huge balloon shaped like a giant cow
sentences.cn: 形似一头巨牛的大气球

sentences.en: A mature cow has horns.
sentences.cn: 成年奶牛有犄角。

sentences.en: Any product made from cow's milk made him vomit.
sentences.cn: 任何乳制品都会让他呕吐。

sentences.en: Dad went out to milk the cows.
sentences.cn: 爸爸出去给牛挤奶去了。

sentences.en: don't have a cow—it's no big deal.
sentences.cn: 别着急——没什么大不了。

sentences.en: He kept a few dairy cows.
sentences.cn: 他养了几头奶牛。

sentences.en: He touched the cow's side with his stick.
sentences.cn: 他用棍子碰了碰牛的肋部。

sentences.en: His nose told him that he was getting near the cow shed.
sentences.cn: 他的嗅觉告诉他,他正走近牛棚.

sentences.en: Our cow is carrying again.
sentences.cn: 我家的母牛又怀胎了。

sentences.en: She watched the cow's ponderous progress.
sentences.cn: 她看着牛迟缓地向前走着。

sentences.en: Suddenly the cow kicked up its hind legs.
sentences.cn: 奶牛突然尥起了蹶子。

sentences.en: Switzerland isn't all cow bells and yodelling, you know.
sentences.cn: 你知道，瑞士不仅仅只有牛铃声和约德尔调歌声。

sentences.en: The cow cast a calf.
sentences.cn: 这头母牛早产了。

sentences.en: The cow is expected to calve next week.
sentences.cn: 这头母牛预期下周生小牛。

sentences.en: The cow says "moo-moo".
sentences.cn: 奶牛“哞哞”叫。

sentences.en: The cow stamped on his side, winding him.
sentences.cn: 牛重重地踩在他的肋部，使他喘不上气来。

sentences.en: The cowboy splashed his way across the shallow stream with his cow.
sentences.cn: 牧童牵着牛淌过浅溪.

sentences.en: The disease is more commonly known as Mad Cow Disease.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病更通俗的名称是疯牛病。

sentences.en: The farmer felt the cow, went away, returned, sorely perplexed, always afraid of being cheated.
sentences.cn: 那农民摸摸那头牛, 走了又回来, 犹豫不决, 总怕上当受骗.

sentences.en: The guests stayed till the cows came home.
sentences.cn: 客人们作长时间的逗留

sentences.en: those two could talk till the cows came home.
sentences.cn: 这两个人可以没完没了地聊下去。

sentences.en: You cannot sell the cow and sup the milk.
sentences.cn: 不能既想卖乳牛,又想喝牛奶.

words.tran_cn: 奶牛，[畜牧]母牛；[脊椎]母兽

phrases.tran_cn: [俚]不会吧！；哎呀！；我的天啊（等于holy cats）
圣牛（印度教等的）；不可修改的文稿；不可批评的人（思想或事物）
(非正式)长时间地；没完没了地

phrases.phrase: till the cows come home【非正式用语】

trans.tran_cn: 奶牛，母牛，雌性动物，婆娘
trans.tran_en: a large female animal that is kept on farms and used to produce milk or meat
a large female animal that is kept on farms and used to produce milk or meat
to frighten someone in order to make them do something
